name: Melon Berry
description:
Pretty Simple. Melon base with Strawberry and Optional EM to boost it up. Able to sub out pretty much anything with your preferences. I talk more about it in my podcast: mixlr.com/cloudstate/showreel 
Overnight Steep 
ENJOY!
author: cloudstate

reviews.text: A tasty melon flavour, but I think the strawberry was a bit to high in this recipe. I would lower strawberry to 2-3% or remove completely and up the cantaloupe and Honeydew and maybe add .5% Super Sweet. I gave a C+ in my notes.

pretty good, a fair sweet vape, exactly what i was looking for, thanks. imo it could use a touch more cantaloupe and honeydew melon. i have tfa cantaloupe so i'm not sure how much different mine would be from op, but still very delicious. Thanks
